txt.en: 'I have returned from scouting Dâr Mauzur and there are Orcs and the like gathering there in numbers. They seem to be carting in supplies. If you find yourself in Dâr Mauzur, it may be useful to take some of their supplies.'
Bregdal, a soldier of Gondor, has scouted Talath Úrui and found a fortified enemy encampment within the sprawling wreckage of Dâr Mauzur.
'Thank you [placeholder]. These supplies will help us keep continue watch over Talath Úrui.'
Bregdal can be found on the border of Talath Úrui and Dor Amarth.\n\nYou should bring the supplies to Bregdal.

A notice is pinned to the board, signed by Bredgal:\n\n'Many supplies have been seen in the encampment of Dâr Mauzur, in Talath Úrui. A brave adventurer is needed to infiltrate the encampment and recover some of these supplies.'
Bregdal has asked you to gather any supplies you might find in Dâr Mauzur.
